caption: A soulful R&B ballad featuring smooth male falsetto vocals over lush piano chords and warm bass. The arrangement includes subtle strings, finger snaps, and a gentle drum groove that creates an intimate late-night atmosphere perfect for romance.
lyrics:
[Intro]
Ooh, baby

[Verse 1]
Candles burning low in our room tonight
Your silhouette dancing in the golden light
I've been waiting all day just to hold you close
You're the only one who matters the most

[Pre-Chorus]
Every moment with you feels like a dream
You're everything and more than you seem

[Chorus]
Let me love you slow
Let the whole world go
In your arms I've found my home
Let me love you slow
Watch the moonlight glow
Baby you're the one I know

[Verse 2]
Whisper secrets only we can share
Run my fingers gently through your hair
Time stands still when I look in your eyes
With you I don't need no disguise

[Pre-Chorus]
Every moment with you feels like a dream
You're everything and more than you seem

[Chorus]
Let me love you slow
Let the whole world go
In your arms I've found my home
Let me love you slow
Watch the moonlight glow
Baby you're the one I know

[Bridge]
I don't need the stars when I have your light
You make everything feel so right

[Outro]
Let me love you slow
Ooh, baby, slow
